name: Alvin Joy
bio: CSE Undergrad | Web Dev | ML Enthusiast | ❤️ OpenSource

top_projects.name: NaniBot
top_projects.description: My first discord bot using discord.js

top_projects.name: Chat
top_projects.description: This is a realtime chat application built using React, Vite, and Appwrite.

top_projects.name: Hive
top_projects.description: Hive is a social networking platform featuring profile creation, CRUD operations for threads (called buzzes) and communities, multi-level comments on buzzes, and search functionality. It includes activity feeds, profile and community tabs, and personalized suggestions. Built with Next.js, MongoDB, TailwindCSS and React Hook. Components by ShadCN UI

alvinsjoy/links.summary: Recent activities include refactoring, feature additions, and bug fixes. Notable updates include migrating Next.js configuration to ES module format, implementing analytics script rewrites, and adding a command menu with mobile optimization.

alvinsjoy/stackoverflow.summary: The repository saw significant updates, including authentication flow refactoring with hooks, addition of email verification, and enhancements to input and label components with motion effects. Routing simplification and addition of an AuthWrapper for handling routing during authentication were also implemented.

alvinsjoy/Hive.summary: Activities included a dependency update to bump Next.js from 14.2.12 to 14.2.21, which includes bug fixes and improvements, such as upgrades to React and fixes for unstable_allowDynamic when used with pnpm, ensuring compatibility and resolving potential issues.

alvinsjoy/PortfolioWebsite.summary: Recent updates involved refactoring the analytics script to use rewrites, enhancing development builds with turbopack, and streamlining the contact section by changing it to links, aiming to improve performance and user experience.

alvinsjoy/register.summary: Notable activities include the addition of Google site verification and domain registrations, such as julianwe17.is-a.dev and gilang.is-a.dev, along with the creation and updates of various JSON files for different domains, indicating an expansion of registered sites.

profile_summary:
Alvin Joy is a skilled and accomplished software developer with a strong foundation in C, TypeScript, and C++, delivering high-quality solutions that meet and exceed expectations. As a computer science undergraduate with a passion for web development and machine learning, Alvin brings a unique blend of technical expertise and innovative thinking to the table. With a growing professional network of 34 followers and an impressive portfolio of 32 public repositories, Alvin has established himself as a reliable and dedicated developer who is committed to staying at the forefront of industry trends and advancements.

As a web development enthusiast and open-source advocate, Alvin is dedicated to leveraging his technical skills to drive positive change and push the boundaries of what is possible. With a keen eye for detail and a talent for problem-solving, Alvin is well-equipped to tackle complex challenges and develop innovative solutions that meet the needs of a rapidly evolving tech landscape. By combining his technical prowess with a passion for collaboration and community engagement, Alvin has established himself as a valuable asset to the development community, and is poised to make a lasting impact in the world of software development and beyond.
